question: Where will the 6th edition of India International Science Festival (IISF) 2020 take place?
explanation:
The 6th edition of IISF - India International Science Festival 202 will be held from 22nd to 25th December.
This yearâ€™s IISF would take place in a virtual mode. IISF is an annual event jointly organised by various science & technology related Ministries and Departments in association with Vijnana Bharati.
